openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://my-service.com/api
paths:

    get:
      summary: Summary
      responses:
        "200":

  /circular_example:
    get:
      summary: Summary
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "./schema.yaml#/components/schemas/CircularSchema"
